title: GpuRaySensor sees through objects with minimum range set to 1 meter

content.raw:
The GpuRaySensor will see through objects if it's minimum range is set to 1 meter. The range at which it will do so depends on where the object is. It appears to be worse towards the edges of the cameras. The picture below should be using two Ogre cameras, it's worse in the middle where the cameras meet, and at the far ends of the scan.

![gpu_ray_passes_through_obstacles.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3228242397-gpu_ray_passes_through_obstacles.png)
